Room.Name: Appleton Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Appleton Road, southeast of the Allisk Circle.
Room.LongDescription: Appleton Road runs diagonally through the southern edge of town, passing between the Circle-Bar Cattle Ranch and the Slaughterhouse. It continues southeast until it reaches the southern City Walls at Golden Dolphin Way. To the northwest, you can see the Allisk Circle, one of the centers of unnatural activity in Oceancrest.
